name: cell:beforerender
description: Fires the event before a cell is rendered.

returns.description: The numerical index of the column.
returns.name: ZGData.columnIndex

returns.description: The full data object for the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The numerical index of the row.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

name: cell:click
description: Fires the event when a click occurs to a cell.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: cell:closeedit
description: Fires the event when the cell editor is closed.

returns.description: If the user canceled instead of saving the cell edit.
returns.name: ZGData.canceled

returns.description: The numerical index of the column.
returns.name: ZGData.columnIndex

returns.description: The full data object for the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The new value of the cell after editing.
returns.name: ZGData.newValue

returns.description: The numerical index of the row.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: cell:copy
description: Fires the event when copying (ctrl+c) occurs in a cell.

returns.description: The data copied from the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

dependency: The `selector` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: cell:mouseout
description: Fires the event when mouse is moved out of a cell.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: cell:mouseover
description: Fires the event when mouse is moved over a cell.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: cell:openedit
description: Fires the event when the cell editor is opened.

returns.description: The numerical index of the column.
returns.name: ZGData.columnIndex

returns.description: The full data object for the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The numerical index of the row.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

dependency: The `editor` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: cell:paste
description: Fires the event when pasting (ctrl+p) occurs in a cell.
dependency: The `editor` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: cell:rightclick
description: Fires the event when right click occurs on a cell.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget
